originalText.text: Dr. Bergman has been my doctor for going on 5 years and I would recommend him to anybody. He’s responsive, thoughtful, and kind. Strong recommend!

text.text: Dr. Bergman has been my doctor for going on 5 years and I would recommend him to anybody. He’s responsive, thoughtful, and kind. Strong recommend!

originalText.text: Since I Start it seeing Dr Bergman Over 10yrs ago he have been very reliable and  knowledgeable someone who know his job and you can depend on I am glad he is my Doctor.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Bergman for number of years and I can't recommend him enough. We have worked together to get me to a place where my quality of life has increased drastically. We have worked to find a balance that works, and when some thing stops working we work to fix it. I honestly can't say enough positive things.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Bergman's for at least a couple of years and he is definitely the best.  It is easy to schedule an appointment and Dr. Bergman is easy to reach via gmail.  I would recommend Dr. Ira Bergman to my friends & family.  I am thankful to have him as my physician.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Bergman's for at least a couple of years and he is definitely the best.  It is easy to schedule an appointment and Dr. Bergman is easy to reach via gmail.  I would recommend Dr. Ira Bergman to my friends & family.  I am thankful to have him as my physician.

originalText.text: I recommend Dr. Bergman to anyone and everyone who has had a bad experience with a psychiatrist. I have never had someone be so detailed with their work; someone who actually cares, listens to what you say, and is so patient. He is very intelligent and has very beautiful plants and paintings in his office (yes, he can paint too!). He is super kind and easy going, it almost feels as if you are just talking to a friend concerned about your wellbeing. The office is very nice and clean, and I love the selection of magazines. Also shout out to Donna for holding it down. It takes an amazing, strong, and dedicated person to run the administrative side of the office and Donna has got it! If I could give 6 stars I would!

He is super kind and easy going, it almost feels as if you are just talking to a friend concerned about your wellbeing. The office is very nice and clean, and I love the selection of magazines. Also shout out to Donna for holding it down. It takes an amazing, strong, and dedicated person to run the administrative side of the office and Donna has got it! If I could give 6 stars I would!
